Works fine just follow the instructions to the letter.
1) Run the game exe.
2) Run the keygen, copy the serial from the keygen to the activation window. Keep the keygen running.
3) Click on "Manual Activation" and then click "Back".
4) Now click the "Generate" button in the keygen. Wait a bit.
5) Click on "Manual Activation" again and apply the generated Activation Code from the keygen to finish the activation process.

Enjoy!

/RLD

PS: If you do not follow these steps correctly, have attempted to register the game before for some reason, or for similar reasons
have a problem registering, use the registry editor (regedit.exe) to delete all keys and values under
HKEY_CURRENT_USERSoftwareFOCUSWarGame European EscalationKeys and then retry.

Idiots ,you guys got it all backwards.

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4) Run the game exe.
5) Run the keygen ( from your desktop, don`t put it in the install directory !!), copy the serial from the keygen to the activation window. Keep the keygen running.
6) Click on "Manual Activation" and then click "Back".
7) Now click the "Generate" button in the keygen. Wait a bit.
8) Click on "Manual Activation" again and apply the generated Activation Code from the keygen to finish the activation process.
9) And than finaly last step must be, copy all the crack contents to the installation folder.

Do it this way and game will work!!

Enjoy!
